paragraphs.text:
%flinkStreaming
val text = env.fromElements("To be or not to be")
val counts = text.flatMap { _.toLowerCase.split("\\\\W+") filter { _.nonEmpty } }.map { (_, 1) }.keyBy(0).sum(1)
counts.print


import org.apache.flink.contrib.streaming.scala.DataStreamUtils._

var collected = collect[(String,Int)](counts)
